types.description: UTC time in seconds, counted from January 1, 1970.

commands.name: dispatchKeyEvent
commands.description: Dispatches a key event to the page.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the key event.

parameters.name: modifiers
parameters.description: Bit field representing pressed modifier keys. (default: 0).

parameters.name: text
parameters.description:
Text as generated by processing a virtual key code with a keyboard layout. Not needed for
for `keyUp` and `rawKeyDown` events (default: "")

parameters.name: unmodifiedText
parameters.description:
Text that would have been generated by the keyboard if no modifiers were pressed (except for
shift). Useful for shortcut (accelerator) key handling (default: "").

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Unique DOM defined string value for each physical key (e.g., 'KeyA') (default: "").

parameters.name: key
parameters.description:
Unique DOM defined string value describing the meaning of the key in the context of active
modifiers, keyboard layout, etc (e.g., 'AltGr') (default: "").

parameters.name: windowsVirtualKeyCode
parameters.description: Windows virtual key code (default: 0).

parameters.name: nativeVirtualKeyCode
parameters.description: Native virtual key code (default: 0).

parameters.name: autoRepeat
parameters.description: Whether the event was generated from auto repeat (default: false).

parameters.name: isKeypad
parameters.description: Whether the event was generated from the keypad (default: false).

parameters.name: isSystemKey
parameters.description: Whether the event was a system key event (default: false).

parameters.name: macCommands
parameters.description: Mac editing commands associated with this key

commands.name: dispatchMouseEvent
commands.description: Dispatches a mouse event to the page.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the mouse event.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the event relative to the main frame's viewport in CSS pixels.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description:
Y coordinate of the event relative to the main frame's viewport in CSS pixels. 0 refers to
the top of the viewport and Y increases as it proceeds towards the bottom of the viewport.

parameters.name: modifiers
parameters.description:
Bit field representing pressed modifier keys. Alt=1, Ctrl=2, Meta/Command=4, Shift=8
(default: 0).

parameters.name: button
parameters.description: Mouse button (default: "none").

parameters.name: buttons
parameters.description:
A number indicating which buttons are pressed on the mouse when a mouse event is triggered.
Left=1, Right=2, Middle=4, Back=8, Forward=16, None=0.

parameters.name: clickCount
parameters.description: Number of times the mouse button was clicked (default: 0).

parameters.name: deltaX
parameters.description: X delta in CSS pixels for mouse wheel event (default: 0).

parameters.name: deltaY
parameters.description: Y delta in CSS pixels for mouse wheel event (default: 0).

commands.name: dispatchWheelEvent
commands.description: Dispatches a wheel event to the page.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the event relative to the main frame's viewport in CSS pixels.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description:
Y coordinate of the event relative to the main frame's viewport in CSS pixels. 0 refers to
the top of the viewport and Y increases as it proceeds towards the bottom of the viewport.

parameters.name: modifiers
parameters.description:
Bit field representing pressed modifier keys. Alt=1, Ctrl=2, Meta/Command=4, Shift=8
(default: 0).

parameters.name: deltaX
parameters.description: X delta in CSS pixels for mouse wheel event (default: 0).

parameters.name: deltaY
parameters.description: Y delta in CSS pixels for mouse wheel event (default: 0).

commands.name: dispatchTapEvent
commands.description: Dispatches a tap event to the page.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the event relative to the main frame's viewport in CSS pixels.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description:
Y coordinate of the event relative to the main frame's viewport in CSS pixels. 0 refers to
the top of the viewport and Y increases as it proceeds towards the bottom of the viewport.

parameters.name: modifiers
parameters.description:
Bit field representing pressed modifier keys. Alt=1, Ctrl=2, Meta/Command=4, Shift=8
(default: 0).
